sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { orderData } from '../data/cartData'; import { Trash } from 'react-bootstrap-icons'; import '../style/Cart.css' const Cart = () => { const [orderList, setOrderList] = useState(orderData); return ( <>

Cart

Product
Unit Price
Quantity
Sub-Total
{ orderList.map((item, idx) => (

{item.title}

{item.sku.itemName}

{item.sku.discount > 0 ? {`$${item.sku.price}`} : `$${item.sku.price}` }
{item.sku.discount > 0 ? `$${item.sku.price * (100 - item.sku.discount) / 100}`:
}
{item.amount}
${item.sku.price * (100 - item.sku.discount) / 100 * item.amount}
)) }

Items:

{orderList.length}

Total Price:

{ orderList.reduce((prevVal, currValue) => ( prevVal + currValue.amount * (currValue.sku.price * (100 - currValue.sku.discount) / 100) ), 0) }

) } export default Cart;
